name: Slime Splatter!
description:
Twitch Streamers! "Slime Splatter!" is a game that twitch chat can play on your stream! Chatters join the game and have to survive as long as possible by dodging falling spike traps. A perfect way to keep chatters engaged during a brb or starting soon screen or even just as a fun activity.

Features:

-Easy Twitch Integration.

- Supports Transparent Background.


- Simply type "join" in chat and you'll appear in game.

- Move around using commands such as "R 2" and "L 1.5".

- And even dance by typing "dance"!!!
